example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHPP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 海南)) (VP (PP-MNR (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VP (VV 吸引) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *RNR*-1))) (VP (VV 利用) (NP-OBJ-1 (NN 外资)))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 方式))) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (ADVP (AD 日趋)) (VP (VA 多样化))))
